title: PSRule options
description: A schema for PSRule YAML options files.

configuration.title: Configuration values
configuration.description: A set of key/ value configuration options for rules.
configuration.markdownDescription: A set of key/ value configuration options for rules. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#configuration)

ignoreCase.title: Ignore case
ignoreCase.description: Determines if custom binding uses ignores case when matching properties. The default is true.
ignoreCase.markdownDescription: Determines if custom binding uses ignores case when matching properties. The default is `true`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#bindingignorecase)

nameSeparator.title: Name separator
nameSeparator.description: Configures the separator to use for building a qualified name. The default is '/'.
nameSeparator.markdownDescription: Configures the separator to use for building a qualified name. The default is `/`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#bindingnameseparator)

targetName.title: Bind TargetName
targetName.description: Specifies one or more property names to bind TargetName to.
targetName.markdownDescription: Specifies one or more property names to bind TargetName to. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#bindingtargetname)

targetType.title: Bind TargetType
targetType.description: Specifies one or more property names to bind TargetType to.
targetType.markdownDescription: Specifies one or more property names to bind TargetType to. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#bindingtargettype)

useQualifiedName.title: Use qualified name
useQualifiedName.description: Determines if a qualified TargetName is used. The default is false.
useQualifiedName.markdownDescription: Determines if a qualified TargetName is used. The default is `false`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#bindingusequalifiedname)

languageMode.title: Language mode
languageMode.description: The PowerShell language mode to use for rule execution. The default is FullLanguage.
languageMode.markdownDescription: The PowerShell language mode to use for rule execution. The default is `FullLanguage`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#executionlanguagemode)

inconclusiveWarning.title: Warn on inconclusive rules
inconclusiveWarning.description: Enable or disable warnings for inconclusive rules. The default is true.
inconclusiveWarning.markdownDescription: Enable or disable warnings for inconclusive rules. The default is `true`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#executioninconclusivewarning)

notProcessedWarning.title: Warn on unprocessed objects
notProcessedWarning.description: Enable or disable warnings for objects that are not processed by any rule. The default is true.
notProcessedWarning.markdownDescription: Enable or disable warnings for objects that are not processed by any rule. The default is `true`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#executionnotprocessedwarning)

input-option.title: Input options
input-option.description: Options that affect how input types are processed.

format.title: Input format
format.description: The input string format. The default is Detect, which will try to detect the format when the -InputPath parameter is used.
format.markdownDescription: The input string format. The default is `Detect`, which will try to detect the format when the `-InputPath` parameter is used. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#inputformat)

objectPath.title: Object path
objectPath.description: The object path to a property to use instead of the pipeline object.
objectPath.markdownDescription: The object path to a property to use instead of the pipeline object. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#inputobjectpath)

pathIgnore.title: Path ignore
pathIgnore.description: Ignores input files that match the path spec.
pathIgnore.markdownDescription: Ignores input files that match the path spec. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#inputpathignore)

targetType.title: Target type
targetType.description: Only process objects that match one of the included types.
targetType.markdownDescription: Only process objects that match one of the included types. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#inputtargettype)

limitDebug.title: Scopes for debug messages
limitDebug.description: Limits debug messages to a list of named debug scopes. No scopes are set by default.
limitDebug.markdownDescription: Limits debug messages to a list of named debug scopes. No scopes are set by default. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#logginglimitdebug)

limitVerbose.title: Scopes for verbose messages
limitVerbose.description: Limits verbose messages to a list of named verbose scopes. No scopes are set by default.
limitVerbose.markdownDescription: Limits verbose messages to a list of named verbose scopes. No scopes are set by default. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#logginglimitverbose)

ruleFail.title: Report fail to stream
ruleFail.description: Log fail outcomes for each rule to a specific informational stream. The default is None.
ruleFail.markdownDescription: Log fail outcomes for each rule to a specific informational stream. The default is `None`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#loggingrulefail)

rulePass.title: Report pass to stream
rulePass.description: Log pass outcomes for each rule to a specific informational stream. The default is None.
rulePass.markdownDescription: Log pass outcomes for each rule to a specific informational stream. The default is `None`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#loggingrulepass)

oneOf.title: Suppressed rule
oneOf.description: The name of the rule to suppress.
oneOf.markdownDescription: The name of the rule to suppress. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#suppression)

items.title: Suppress when
items.description: Suppress the rule on TargetNames to suppress.
items.markdownDescription: Suppress the rule on TargetNames to suppress. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#suppression)

oneOf.title: Suppressed rule
oneOf.description: The name of the rule to suppress.
oneOf.markdownDescription: The name of the rule to suppress. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#suppression)

targetName.title: Suppress when
targetName.description: One or more TargetNames to suppress.
targetName.markdownDescription: One or more TargetNames to suppress. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#suppression)

output-option.title: Output options
output-option.description: Options that affect how output is generated.

as.title: Result type
as.description: Determine if detailed or summary results are generated. The default is Detail.
as.markdownDescription: Determine if detailed or summary results are generated. The default is `Detail`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#outputas)

culture.title: Culture
culture.description: One or more cultures to use for generating output. When multiple cultures are specified, the first matching culture will be used. By default, the current PowerShell culture is used.
culture.markdownDescription: One or more cultures to use for generating output. When multiple cultures are specified, the first matching culture will be used. By default, the current PowerShell culture is used. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#outputculture)

encoding.title: Encoding
encoding.description: The encoding to use when writing results to file. The default is Default, UTF-8 without BOM.
encoding.markdownDescription: The encoding to use when writing results to file. The default is `Default`, UTF-8 without BOM. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#outputencoding)

format.title: Output format
format.description: The output format to use when returning results. The default is None.
format.markdownDescription: The output format to use when returning results. The default is `None`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#outputformat)

outcome.title: Output outcome
outcome.description: The outcome of rule results to return. The default is Processed.
outcome.markdownDescription: The outcome of rule results to return. The default is `Processed`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#outputoutcome)

path.title: Output path
path.description: The file path location to save results.
path.markdownDescription: The file path location to save results. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#outputpath)

style.title: Output Style
style.description: The style that results will be presented in. The default is Client.
style.markdownDescription: The style that results will be presented in. The default is `Client`. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#outputstyle)

requires.title: Required modules
requires.description: Specifies the required version of a module to use.
requires.markdownDescription: Specifies the required version of a module to use. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#requires)

rule-option.title: Baseline options
rule-option.description: Options that include/ exclude and configure rules.

include.title: Include rules
include.description: Optionally filter to rules by name.
include.markdownDescription: Optionally filter to rules by name. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#ruleinclude)

exclude.title: Exclude rules
exclude.description: Specifies rules to exclude by name.
exclude.markdownDescription: Specifies rules to exclude by name. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#ruleexclude)

tag.title: Tags
tag.description: Require rules to have the following tags.
tag.markdownDescription: Require rules to have the following tags. [See help](https://microsoft.github.io/PSRule/concepts/PSRule/en-US/about_PSRule_Options.html#ruletag)
